Welcome to FiOS! Installing your Frontier TV Equipment is easy.

To set up your Frontier TV Equipment you need to have your Router set up first.

  • Click here to check out your how to install your Router.

If the service ready date is today or in the past, you can proceed right now. Let’s get started!
